original: intros step a b c os os' H1 H2. induction H1. - apply H2. - simpl. apply RT1nTStep with (x' := x') (cs := cs) (cs' := (cs ++ os')) in IHrefl_trans_1n_trace. + apply RT1nTStep with (x' := x') (cs := []) (cs' := os) in H2. * apply RT1nTStep with (x' := x') (cs := (cs ++ []) ++ os') (cs' := os) in IHrefl_trans_1n_trace. -- rewrite app_nil_r. apply IHrefl_trans_1n_trace. -- apply H2. + apply H1.
